overview: 100 random women VS my friend's woman, which one would you sleep with?  Gun-woo and Tae-cheol have different stances. Every night, Gun-woo enjoys sleeping with different women but Tae-cheol dreams of sleeping with the woman he's had a crush on for 10 years. However, Se-yeong loves Gun-woo. Tae-cheol finds out Gun-woo also has feelings for her and tries to give up but he finds himself more and more drawn to her.
title: Overnight: Friend's Girl
